t: Amazon.com: FixDaBox Large Set: Corner Support Pieces to Repair and Protect Your Game or Puzzle Box. Clip Over Broken lid Corners to Cover Damage and Reinforce Box. Fits Box lids 2.3-3.0 in high. (Pink) : Toys & Games
s: LONG-LASTING SOLUTION: FixDaBox can stay on your box lid as long as you'd like. No more need to touch up corners with glue or tape. Once the sets are on, the problem is solved.

t: A-to-z Guarantee - Amazon Customer Service
s: The A-to-z Guarantee protects you when you buy items sold and fulfilled by a third-party seller who provides their own customer service directly to you. It covers both the timely delivery and condition of your items. You can make a claim directly to Amazon, and our team will check if you're ...

t: Federal regulator says Amazon can be held responsible for faulty goods sold on its marketplace
s: July 30, 2024 - A judge said Amazon's fulfillment program for sellers give it "far-reaching control" over the products sold on its platform.

t: Amazon down? Current status and problems | Downdetector
s: Real-time overview of problems with Amazon. Website down, can't log in or place orders? We'll tell you what is going on.

t: Get Product Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help with using your product or if it doesn't work correctly, Amazon provides free Product Support. Among these options are calls, chat, manufacturer contact details, and text or video troubleshooting guides.

t: Return Items You Ordered - Amazon Customer Service
s: You can return many eligible items sold on Amazon.com. When you return an item, you may see different return options depending on the seller, item, or reason for return.

t: r/UnethicalLifeProTips on Reddit: ULPT if your broken/not working item is still available on Amazon or in a big box store, buy it, replace your item and put the broken one (cleaned up) in the box and return it.
